welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Friern Barnet, a charming and historic town in the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful parks, quaint shops, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and executive flights, providing a more exclusive and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours, with the option to purchase additional time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport serves mainly low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available for all passengers throughout the terminal.
